trans:
ONLY STORES
 
Do you want to be part of one of the fastest growing fashion retailers? Do you want to make steps within the retail in women's fashion and strengthen the position on the Dutch market together with us?
ARE YOU THE ONE AND ONLY?
For our ONLY Store in Eindhoven Woensel we are looking for a sales assistant.
A varied job within fashion; from advising customers, replenishing the store and cash register work to giving the store a neat appearance. Giving styling tips to every customer with a big smile, that makes you happy! Service is important to you and every customer is of course greeted with that same big smile when entering the store. ðŸ˜Š
ONLY FOR YOU
What we offer you:
A pleasant work environment
Almost 40% employee discount on our entire collection
Learn everything about fashion
Cool promotions where you can win an outfit item or a team outing.
Do you stand out positively as a sales assistant? Then there are growth opportunities, for example to assistant store manager.
And of course you will receive a competitive salary, 8% vacation pay and a good pension plan.
WHO ARE YOU?
Do you already have some experience as a salesperson within the fashion industry? That's great, but certainly not a hard requirement. We will teach you everything you need to know as a top salesperson!
